plot: A group of male students kidnap, confine and bind their math teacher for the purpose of perversity and dominance in sexual escapades with women in general.This is about a teacher (kiriko) that has judo and karate skills. A student in her math class wonders how she would be in bed. Some students who have been preying on other female teachers finally get her restrained. They make a deal with her if they cannot get her off in ten minutes of fondling her she will be set free. At first she puts up a real good fight but in the end she gives in to an extent.
